topic: photon-map test with geometrical optics / radiometrics
body:
--------------42B32E258C60D26CE3E79116 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1 Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64 Hi all, A little demo and test with the new photon-map (Roland's photon-map patch) is available at http://www.radiance-online.org/examples/pm-pab/ -Peter pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, www.pab-opto.de --------------42B32E258C60D26CE3E79116 Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Hi all,

A little demo and test with the new photon-map (Roland's photon-map patch) is available at
    http://www.radiance-online.org/examples/pm-pab/

-Peter
